line.comment: * The following var is set by Mayhem.Disengage.
* we order all ships assigned to shipyard to go invade
* if the war score is in favor of the defender, we reset it, otherwise we don't.
* Scales down the invasion if the player is the target.
* Do not go if there's an invasion onboard.

sval.val: The following var is set by Mayhem.Disengage.
we order all ships assigned to shipyard to go invade
if the war score is in favor of the defender, we reset it, otherwise we don't.
Scales down the invasion if the player is the target.
Do not go if there's an invasion onboard.
